ModMetaData.name: Craftable - [JDS] EFT Apparel
ModMetaData.author: Mawy
ModMetaData.description:
Simple XML mod to allow to craft equipment from [JDS] EFT Apparel by JangoDsoul.
Maybe I have to balance a bit of cost and amount of work from items.
Credits: - JangoDsoul - For the creation of [JDS] EFT Apparel - Battlestate Games - For the development of Escape from Tarkov
